description:
An update for Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate is now available from Nintendo eShop.

This will update the software to Version 1.1 with the following amendments:

- A section called “Gift Area” has been added to the download contents section.

Once the update has been downloaded, it will be installed automatically.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused, and recommend downloading this update to ensure a smooth game experience.
name:
Monster Hunter™ 4 Ultimate:
Update
